EmailTemplate.name: Version5 Training.Reminder (One Week) - CA
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Reminder: VisiCAD 5.2 Training (7/31)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> VisiCAD 5.2 Training Complimentary regional training - Next week Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
This is your confirmation that you are registered for the VisiCAD 5.2 Regional Training. Another reminder email will be sent to you the day before training. We look forward to seeing you.
NOTE: Times have from 9 AM to 4 PM.
Date and Location:
Tuesday, July 31 TriTech Corporate Headquarters (new address) 9477 Waples St, Suite 100 San Diego, CA 92121 Click here to view map <http://g.co/maps/5cnku>
Agenda:
9:00 AM - 12:00 NOON VisiCAD 5.2 Functionality and Demonstration
12:00 NOON - 1:30 PM Complimentary Lunch will be provided
1:30 PM - 4:00 PM System Planning and Question and Answer Session with Technical Services
Bonus: Continental breakfast and lunch will be provided.
Question? Gladys Ferguson, Training Supervisor TriTech Software Systems (858) 799-7383 gladys.ferguson@tritech.com
